DOC.criteria: Health child , 45 year age Born fullterm ( Gestational age 3742 week ) Consumed cow 's milk cow 's milkbased beverage 48 hour prior baseline visit Parents legal guardian agree fee child food product supplement contain probiotic prebiotics Signed informed consent History know suspect cow milk protein intolerance Child receive food product ot supplement contain probiotic prebiotics ( exception yogurt ) 15 day prior baseline visit Serious concurrent illness interfere general management child History underlie metabolic chronic disease , congenital malformation , immunocompromised Child 's zscore weight height baseline < 3 accord WHO criteria
